title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-5.27 - Aids home care programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-5.27 - Aids home care programs

State Regulations

Payment for services provided by LTHHCPs certified as AHCPs shall be at rates established pursuant to this Subpart provided, however, that nursing services provided by any LTHHCP to patients diagnosed with Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (AIDS) as defined by ICD-9 codes 042, 043 and 044 shall be reimbursed pursuant to section
86-1.46
(b) of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-5.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
